item.title: 据《美国汽车新闻》报道，如果特朗普继续征收汽车关税，福特汽车可能在 5 月份提价
item.description: 据美国《汽车新闻》周三援引一份给经销商的备忘录报道，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的汽车关税政策不放松，福特汽车可能会在五月份提高新车价格。【原文：Ford Motor may raise prices of its new vehicles in May if U.S. President Donald Trump's auto tariffs are not eased, Automotive News reported on Wednesday, citing a memo to dealers.】

item.title: 近 50 名众议院民主党人对特朗普政府中未经授权的人工智能说不
item.description: 国会议员们在周三发出的一封信中呼吁特朗普政府停止应用任何未经授权的人工智能系统来削减政府开支。【原文：Members of Congress have called on the Trump administration to cease applying any unauthorized artificial intelligence system toward its effort to slash government spending, according to a letter they sent on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔：削减可自由支配的联邦支出无法解决美国债务问题
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三重申了美联储主席数十年来长期坚持的观点，即需要控制美国联邦债务的增长，但他认为政客们的做法是错误的。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday reiterated the long-held view of Fed chairs going back decades that growth in the U.S. federal debt needs to be reined in, but he suggested that politicians are going about it the wrong way.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称市场有序，淡化干预风险
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，人们对央行介入抑制市场波动的希望很可能是错误的。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell suggested on Wednesday that hopes the central bank will step in to tamp down on market volatility are likely misplaced.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 正在洽谈以约 30 亿美元的价格收购 Windsurf
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引一位知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 正在讨论以约 30 亿美元的价格收购人工智能辅助编码工具 Windsurf。【原文：OpenAI is in discussions to buy artificial intelligence-assisted coding tool Windsurf for about $3 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 莱茵金属公司首席执行官告诉《德国商报》，订单潜力高达 3410 亿美元
item.description: 德国莱茵金属公司首席执行官表示，受欧洲增加国防开支和对俄罗斯形成可信威慑的影响，到本十年末，该公司的订单量将增至 3,000 亿欧元（3,410 亿美元）。【原文：Rheinmetall could boost its order book to up to 300 billion euros ($341 billion) by the end of the decade, its CEO said, boosted by Europe's efforts to ramp up defence spending and create credible deterrence against Russia.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，美国正在酝酿阻止 DeepSeek 购买美国技术的惩罚措施
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周三报道，特朗普政府正在权衡阻止中国 DeepSeek 购买美国技术的处罚措施，并正在讨论禁止美国人使用其服务。【原文：The Trump administration is weighing penalties that would block China's DeepSeek from buying U.S. technology and debating barring Americans' access to its services, the New York Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在特朗普贸易政策的压力下，Shein、Temu 将提高价格
item.description: 随着美国总统特朗普对低价值进口商品的打击和全面征收关税，以低价产品著称的中国在线商城特步和快时尚零售商Shein将于下周提高产品价格。【原文：Chinese online marketplace Temu and fast-fashion retailer Shein will raise prices on their products next week as President Trump's crackdown on low-value imports and sweeping tariffs increase expenses for the companies known for their low-priced offerings.】

item.title: 大众汽车将在 5 月前保持汽车价格稳定
item.description: 大众汽车（Volkswagen）周三证实，该公司正加入越来越多的汽车制造商行列，承诺保持价格稳定，以缓解汽车消费者对关税的担忧。【原文：Volkswagen confirmed Wednesday that it is joining the growing group of automakers committing to keeping prices steady to ease car shoppers' concerns around tariffs.】

item.title: VIE 鲍威尔称美联储将按兵不动直至关税影响明朗化
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，美国经济增长似乎正在放缓，消费者支出增长温和，为避免关税而抢购进口商品可能会拖累国内生产总值的估计值，而且情绪也在变坏。【原文：U.S. economic growth appears to be slowing, with consumer spending growing modestly, a rush of imports to avoid tariffs likely to weigh on estimates of gross domestic product, and sentiment souring, U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩的 Greenlight 第一季度增长 8.2%，继续看涨黄金
item.description: 对冲基金绿光资本（Greenlight Capital）在2025年前三个月的收益率为8.2%，受押注黄金的提振，该基金称，由于预计特朗普政府的政策将继续扰乱金融市场，因此押注黄金的收益应该会进一步提高。【原文：Hedge fund Greenlight Capital gained 8.2% in the first three months of 2025, buoyed by a bet on gold that it said should pay off further as it expects Trump administration policies to continue roiling financial markets.】

item.title: 英国石油公司开始从 Venture Global 的卡尔卡西厄通道工厂装运首批液化天然气货物
item.description: 根据 LSEG 的数据，英国石油公司将于本周三开始从 Venture Global 位于路易斯安那州的 Calcasieu Pass 工厂装运第一批液化天然气。【原文：BP Plc will begin loading its first shipment of liquefied natural gas from Venture Global's Calcasieu Pass plant in Louisiana on Wednesday, according to LSEG data.】

item.title: 交易员继续押注美联储今年从 6 月开始降息
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示美国央行完全有能力在政策立场发生任何变化之前等待更加明朗的情况后，交易员们周三继续押注美联储今年降息。【原文：Traders on Wednesday kept bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts this year after Fed Chair Jerome Powell said the U.S. central bank is well-positioned to wait for greater clarity before making any changes to the stance of policy.】

item.title: 日产美国负责人称关税将打击低收入汽车消费者
item.description: 日产汽车美洲公司董事长克里斯蒂安-穆尼耶（Christian Meunier）周三表示，他担心关税可能会使本已令人瞠目的汽车价格进一步上涨。【原文：The chairman of Nissan Americas, Christian Meunier, said on Wednesday he is concerned that tariffs may drive already eye-popping vehicle prices even higher.】

item.title: 加州起诉特朗普政府阻止征收关税
item.description: 加利福尼亚州周三提起诉讼，要求阻止美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对外国贸易伙伴全面征收关税，指责他滥用职权，给该州和国家造成经济损失。【原文：California on Wednesday filed a lawsuit seeking to block U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs on foreign trading partners, accusing him of abusing his powers and inflicting financial harm on the state and nation.】

item.title: 亚洲需求保持稳定，Moncler 第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 意大利奢侈外衣集团 Moncler 周三公布，第一季度收入增长 1%，增幅高于预期，主要得益于直接面向消费者的销售和亚洲需求。【原文：Italian luxury outerwear group Moncler on Wednesday reported a stronger than expected 1% increase in revenue in the first quarter thanks mostly to direct-to-consumer sales and Asian demand.】

item.title: 西南航空公司因咖啡溅到 4 岁男孩身上而被起诉："太烫了
item.description: 西南航空公司周三被犹他州的一对父母告上法庭，他们说，一名粗心的空乘将滚烫的咖啡洒在他们 4 岁的儿子身上，导致他的臀部二度烧伤。【原文：Southwest Airlines was sued on Wednesday by Utah parents who said their 4-year-old son suffered second-degree burns to his buttocks when a careless flight attendant spilled boiling hot coffee on him.】

item.title: 世界银行班加敦促发展中国家降低关税，重视区域贸易
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周三敦促发展中国家实现贸易自由化，称许多发展中国家的关税仍高于发达经济体，降低关税可以抵消对等进口税的风险。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga urged developing countries on Wednesday to liberalize trade, saying many maintained higher tariffs than advanced economies and lowering them could offset the risk of reciprocal import taxes.】

item.title: 通用动力公司称 G800 获得 FAA 和 EASA 认证
item.description: 通用动力公司周三表示，其湾流 G800 喷气式飞机已获得美国联邦航空管理局和欧盟航空安全局的认证。【原文：General Dynamics said on Wednesday its Gulfstream G800 jet has earned a certification from the Federal Aviation Administration and the European Union Aviation Safety Agency.】

item.title: 央行寻求更多数据，美联储哈马克认为货币政策将保持稳定
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周三表示，目前美国经济的不确定性较高，因此央行应在利率政策上保持稳定，并在决定下一步行动之前了解更多信息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said on Wednesday that high levels of uncertainty in the U.S. economy right now argue for the central bank to hold steady on interest rate policy and take in more information before deciding what needs to happen next.】

item.title: 意大利 Cucinelli 公司第一季度销售额增长 10.5%
item.description: 意大利奢侈时装集团布鲁内罗-库奇内利（Brunello Cucinelli）周三表示，受零售和批发渠道稳健表现的推动，按固定汇率计算，第一季度销售额增长了 10.5%。【原文：Italian luxury fashion group Brunello Cucinelli on Wednesday said sales had risen 10.5% at constant exchange rates in the first quarter, boosted by a solid performance in retail and wholesale channels.】

item.title: 世界银行班加称不确定美国对国际开发协会的捐款，特朗普对话具有建设性
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周三表示，他与特朗普政府就发展贷款机构进行了建设性的讨论，但他补充说，他不知道美国将为该银行面向世界最贫穷国家的基金提供多少捐款。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga said on Wednesday that he has had constructive discussions with the Trump administration about the development lender but added that he does not know how much the U.S. will contribute to the bank's fund for the world's poorest countries.】

item.title: 惠誉认为大流行病之外的世界经济增长为 2009 年以来最弱
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周三下调了全球经济增长预期，预计随着全球贸易紧张局势的升级，除 COVID-19 大流行之外，全球经济将出现 2009 年以来最弱的扩张。【原文：Fitch Ratings cut its global growth forecasts on Wednesday, projecting the weakest expansion since 2009 save for the COVID-19 pandemic as global trade tensions escalate.】

item.title: TikTok 开始在美国测试与 X 的 "社区笔记 "类似的 "脚注
item.description: TikTok 周三开始在美国测试 "脚注 "功能，该功能类似于 X 和 Meta 使用的 "社区笔记"，因为该短视频平台正在等待达成一项协议，以确保其在美国的存在。【原文：TikTok on Wednesday started testing "Footnotes" in the United States, a feature similar to "Community Notes" used by X and Meta , as the short-video platform awaits a deal that will secure its presence in the country.】

item.title: 欧盟搁置制裁俄罗斯液化天然气进口的想法
item.description: 欧盟官员表示，由于一些国家政府的抵制以及替代来源的不确定性，欧洲官员放弃了在即将推出的一揽子计划中推动禁止该集团进口俄罗斯液化天然气的想法。【原文：European officials have dropped the idea of pushing for a ban on the bloc's Russian liquefied natural gas imports in upcoming packages because of resistance from some governments and uncertainty about alternative sources, EU officials said.】

item.title: 法国水下无人机制造商 Exail 订单量激增 500% 以上
item.description: 法国高科技工业集团 Exail Technologies 周三公布，受欧洲各国政府国防开支增加的推动，该公司今年第一季度的订单量增长了 519%。【原文：French high-tech industrial group Exail Technologies on Wednesday reported a 519% rise in its order intake in the first quarter of the year, driven by higher defence spending by European governments.】

item.title: 元审判：扎克伯格证词的 5 个关键时刻
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）本周在华盛顿的一场高风险庭审中作证，美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）正试图解除 Meta 对重要资产 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 的收购。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg testified this week at a high-stakes trial in Washington where the U.S. Federal Trade Commission is seeking to unwind Meta's acquisitions of prized assets Instagram and WhatsApp.】

item.title: 英国 Ocado 首席执行官斯坦纳暂时掌管技术部门
item.description: 英国网上超市和技术公司 Ocado 周三表示，首席执行官蒂姆-斯坦纳（Tim Steiner）将暂时领导 Ocado 解决方案公司，该公司的子部门专注于为零售商提供全方位的技术平台。【原文：British online supermarket and technology firm Ocado said on Wednesday that CEO Tim Steiner will temporarily lead Ocado Solutions, the company's sub-unit which focuses on an all-encompassing technology platform for retailers.】

item.title: 人工智能生成的音乐占上传到 Deezer 的所有曲目的 18
item.description: 法国流媒体平台 Deezer 周三表示，上传到 Deezer 的歌曲中约有 18% 完全由人工智能生成，这表明在版权风险和对艺术家公平报酬的担忧下，人工智能技术的应用日益广泛。【原文：About 18% of songs uploaded to Deezer are fully generated by AI, the French streaming platform said on Wednesday, underscoring the technology's growing use amid copyright risks and concerns about fair payouts to artists.】

item.title: DIW 称，使用人工智能提高了预测欧洲央行行动的准确性
item.description: 德国柏林经济研究所（DIW Berlin）周三的一项研究称，人工智能的使用将提高预测欧洲中央银行货币政策动向的准确性。【原文：The use of artificial intelligence will increase accuracy when predicting the monetary policy moves of the European Central Bank, a study by the German Institute for Economic Research DIW Berlin said on Wednesday.】
